Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The typical process flow might be: SS -> OP -> RC -> QI -> CA -> PT -> PK -> WS -> DT -> AS.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: for a given trace like <A,B,C,D>, the pairs (A,B), (A,C), (A,D), (B,C), (B,D), (C,D) are considered. So it's all ordered pairs where the first activity appears before the second in the trace.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: define base durations and std devs for consecutive pairs: SS OP: avg=7200 sec, std=3600 sec; OP RC: avg=864000 sec, std=259200 sec; and so on for all consecutive edges.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: for any pair (i,j) with i<j, the average time is the sum of the averages of the consecutive edges from i to j along the path, and the standard deviation is sqrt(sum of variances along the path).

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: construct a dictionary that includes a representative subset, ensuring complexity by considering pairs of activities that may be separated by multiple steps. So we don't have to include all possible pairs.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: compute prefix sums of averages P[i] and variances V[i]. Then for pair (i,j) average = P[j] - P[i], variance = V[j] - V[i], std = sqrt(variance).

Name: Validation - PE
Text: compute for each selected pair the average and std, rounding to nearest integer where necessary, verifying closeness to perfect squares and rounding rules.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: produce the dictionary with direct pairs and non-direct pairs like (SS,RC), (SS,QI), (SS,AS), (OP,PT), (RC,DT), (QI,AS), (CA,AS), (PT,AS), (PK,AS), using the computed values.
